TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Duplexing extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定打印机是使用单面打印，还是使用某种类型的双面（双工打印）打印。

span.span: Specifies whether a printer uses one-sided printing or some type of two-sided (duplex) printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类型的值主要用于以下目的:Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 作为的属性的 集合的成员, 这些值表示打印机支持的一种单面打印和两次打印。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the kinds of one-sided and two-sided printing that the printer supports. - 作为的属性的值, 它们指示打印机使用单面打印或某种类型的双面打印。As the value of the property of a , they direct the printer to use one-sided printing or some kind of two-sided printing. 对象的属性中从不使用**未知**值。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 永远不应将属性设置为 "**未知**"。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果生成应用程序的其他部分创建了一个*PrintTicket 文档*, 该文档将双面打印功能设置为无法识别的双面选项 (即, 未在 [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项), 则使用该文档构造的应用程序中的对象将作为该属性的值未知。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the duplexing feature to an unrecognized duplexing option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. [](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) 尽管和 类不能被继承, 但你可以扩展打印架构来识别在或类中不考虑的打印设备功能。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[操作说明：扩展打印架构并创建新的打印系统类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100))。For more information see [How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能, 以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. 。. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing OneSided = int32(1)

summary.span: 仅在每张纸的单面上输出打印。

span.span: Output prints on only one side of each sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing TwoSidedLongEdge = int32(3)

summary.span: 在每张纸的两个面上输出打印，其沿着平行于 的边缘翻转。

span.span: Output prints on both sides of each sheet, which flips along the edge parallel to the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing TwoSidedShortEdge = int32(2)

summary.span: 在每张纸的两个面上输出打印，其沿着平行于 的边缘翻转。

span.span: Output prints on both sides of each sheet, which flips along the edge parallel to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Duplexing Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在打印架构中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the Print Schema.
